reviews.review: Good game but may upgrade anticheat then

O jogo em si é ótimo, principalmente depois da chegada da nova operação. O único problema, é que quem não tem condições para comprar o prime terá que aguentar os cheaters até alcançar o nível 21 e pegar o prime de graça
play this game or you are gays

Sin venir a cuento me pega unos lagazos con un i5 6500 y una gtx 1060 en 1080p... este juego es un saca cuartos para los que se quieren dejar el dinero en cajas de loot y ya está. Y como no para de decirme Steam que le haga una reseña pues ahí la tiene.
get called the n word every game wonderful expirience

very nice friendly atmosphere, everyone is so supportive. x

I was playing some casual with some friends of mine. 
They went on the opposite team (we used auto select) and my team got filled with bots (we had been playing for a while in the same lobby)
But I got this one guy on my team, he was talking in voice chat to me and was really nice.
It turned out he was a smurf... and drunk.
Funny guy, would play with him again if I got the chance
